document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">outgrow </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">love, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">things </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">put </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Drawer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">Antique </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">fashion </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">shows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Costumes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">Grandsires </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">wore. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: We outgrow love like other things
